songs.title: Bond Money
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Thouxanbanfauni & BandManFari]
Bands, bands, bands
Aye sauce it up
Nah forreal though, everyday we get this shit

[Hook: Lil Bibby & Thouxanbanfauni ]
All of my niggas they go hard for me (look)
Shoot a nigga I got bond money (look)
My lil' bro will take the charge for me, yeah (aye lil bro)
And he know I got his bond money (forreal though)
Look, aye bond money, bond money, I got bon-
I got bond money, bond money, I got bond money
Bond money, bond money, I got bond money
Bond money, look, I got that bond money

[Verse 1: Thouxanbanfauni]
I got bond money
All these niggas say they get it now but they got stall money
If I make it rain right now lil' bitch then I got fall money
It's autumn right now, October passed if you call money
Call honey, she gon' call for me, who gon' call for me
And I get it right now, why you got that snail money
Slow money, and I move them packs if you need mail money
Look funny, left the bitch, now she just look stale from me
Get it out the mud, doubled up, put it in the cup
And I got that gaup, two times, I done doubled up
I done fucked up the whole check when I re'd-up
Give a fuck, kick down your door, then I get it up

[Hook: Lil Bibby & Thouxanbanfauni ]
All of my niggas they go hard for me (look)
Shoot a nigga I got bond money (look)
My lil' bro will take the charge for me, yeah (aye lil bro)
And he know I got his bond money (forreal though)
Look, aye bond money, bond money, I got bon-
I got bond money, bond money, I got bond money
Bond money, bond money, I got bond money
Bond money, look, I got that bond money

[Verse 2: BandManFari]
Bitch I'ma shooter so you know that I got that bond money
Shooters wit' me bond 'em out, yeah wit' all hunnid'
Roll the window down, get to bussin', now they all runnin'
Leave a dead body stankin', like a whole onion
Roll around the city, like this cutter, 'bout to rip somethin'
Niggas they be pussy, yeah I dare a nigga temp somethin'
Dare a nigga try me, you know I'ma have to rip somethin'
Ridin' with this glizzy yeah .45 'bout lick somethin'
I'ma lick somethin' know that I'm gon' rip somethin'
This bitch she suck dick, on the tip, huh
Yeah these diamonds they lit bruh
Get this nigga off the -

[Hook: Lil Bibby & Thouxanbanfauni ]
All of my niggas they go hard for me (look)
Shoot a nigga I got bond money (look)
My lil' bro will take the charge for me, yeah (aye lil bro)
And he know I got his bond money (forreal though)
Look, aye bond money, bond money, I got bon-
I got bond money, bond money, I got bond money
Bond money, bond money, I got bond money
Bond money, look, I got that bond money

[Outro: Lil Bibby & Thouxanbanfauni]
All of my niggas they go hard for me
Look, shoot a nigga I got bond money
Aye lil bro
And he know I got his bond money(forreal though)
Look, bond money
Bands, bands, bands, bands, bands, bands
Bands, bands, bands, bands, bands, bands, bands
